thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com | 41 of 805
thread.title: Mrs Helen Chisholm
thread.title_full: CarTrawler reviewed by Mrs Helen Chisholm

author: Mrs Helen Chisholm
title: Mrs Helen Chisholm
text:
The booking process was easy and the price very reasonable.
We had to wait 30mins for the bus but it didn't take long to get to the car-hire in the Hilton Hotel.
We were informed that our car, plus the car of the lady customer at the other desk, was only filled to 2 notches of petrol instead of the stated 'half full' tank in the information when booking. This is all very well except we had to hope that there were no traffic jams/holdups to empty the tank before finding a petrol station!
The man who served us was very matter of fact and serious and obviously tired. The other gentleman (who served the lady) was smiling, friendly and very accommodating.
The young man ( Majic ?) who actually handed over the car and was there when we dropped it off, was very pleasant and helpful.
Because of the price we would use the Company again and hope that there's a decent amount of petrol available!
